SEARCH
Module com.example.projectthree
Package com.example.projectthree

Class AccountDatabase

java.lang.Object
com.example.projectthree.AccountDatabase
public class AccountDatabase extends Object
Class that manages an Array of accounts. Maintains an Account array through open, close, and print operations.
Author:
Abhishek Thakare, Adhit Thakur

  • Constructor Details

    • AccountDatabase

      public AccountDatabase(Account[] accounts, int numAcct)
      Constructor to initialize an AccountDatabase.
      Parameters:
      accounts - The array of Accounts, initially size 4.
      numAcct - The number of accounts, initially 0.

  • Method Details

    • find

      private int find(Account account)
      Locate a given Account within the AccountDatabase.
      Parameters:
      account - the account to be searched for.
      Returns:
      The index of the account if found, NOT_FOUND otherwise.

    • grow

      private void grow()
      Grow the AccountDatabase if max capacity is reached. If the last element in the AccountDatabase is non-null, the array needs to grow. Makes 4 more spaces for additional Accounts.

    • contains

      public boolean contains(Account account)
      Check if Account is within the AccountDatabase.
      Parameters:
      account - The Account to be checked for.
      Returns:
      true if Account is in AccountDatabase, false otherwise.

    • open

      public boolean open(Account account)
      Add an account to the AccountDatabase. Checking if valid Account not done here. Simply adding to AccountDatabase.
      Parameters:
      account - The Account to be added.
      Returns:
      true if added to AccountDatabase, false otherwise.

    • close

      public boolean close(Account account)
      Remove an Account from the AccountDatabase. Given an Account, remove that Account entirely from the AccountDatabase.
      Parameters:
      account - The Account to be removed.
      Returns:
      true if Account was removed, false otherwise.

    • withdraw

      public boolean withdraw(Account account)
      Remove money from balance of specified account. Given an Account, remove the balance given from the input of that account.
      Parameters:
      account - The Account whose balance is taken away from.
      Returns:
      true if balance can be withdrawn, false otherwise.

    • deposit

      public void deposit(Account account)
      Add money to balance of specified account Given an Account, add the balance given from the input into the account's balance.
      Parameters:
      account - The Account whose balance is added onto.

    • printSorted

      public void printSorted(javafx.scene.control.TextArea mainTextArea)
      Print accounts from account array sorted by account type and profile Goes in order of: Checking, College Checking, Money Market, Savings. For similar account types, compare last name, then first name.

    • printFeesAndInterests

      public void printFeesAndInterests(javafx.scene.control.TextArea mainTextArea)
      Print accounts from account array with what their interests/fees would be. Follows sorted order of Checking, College Checking, Money Market, then Savings.

    • printUpdatedBalances

      public void printUpdatedBalances(javafx.scene.control.TextArea mainTextArea)
      Print accounts from account array with their actual updated interests/fees/balance. Follows sorted order of Checking, College Checking, Money Market, then Savings.

    • getNumAcct

      public int getNumAcct()
      Gets the number of accounts in the AccountDatabase.
      Returns:
      number of accounts in the AccountDatabase.

    • containsForClose

      public Account containsForClose(Account account, String type)
      Gets the account that matches specified account.
      Returns:
      the account that matches the given account, null otherwise

    • insertionSortDefault

      public void insertionSortDefault(Account[] accounts)
      Performs the sorting needed for the "P" command.
      Parameters:
      accounts - The accounts array to be sorted.

    • insertionSortFeesAndInterest

      public void insertionSortFeesAndInterest(Account[] accounts)
      Performs the sorting needed for the "PI" command.
      Parameters:
      accounts - The accounts array to be sorted.

    • insertionSortUb

      public void insertionSortUb(Account[] accounts)
      Performs the sorting needed for the "UB" command.
      Parameters:
      accounts - The accounts array to be sorted.
